article_text:
01:19

'Narrow window of opportunity' to keep Zika from spreading, says CDC

article_metadata.news-keywords: South Florida, fraud, Medicare, Medicaid, home health, Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, healthcare fraud, waste and abuse
article_metadata.description: Citing the continuing potential for fraudulent billing to Medicare and Medicaid, federal regulators extended through January 2016 a ban on licensing of new home health agencies in Miami-Dade, Broward and Monroe counties.
article_metadata.title: Feds extend ban on new home health agencies in South Florida | Miami Herald
